title: From Insta-feed to cart: Join Costco and score a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card*
description: Macworld You’ve seen the viral rotisserie chicken. The giant snack jars. The modular greenhouse with thousands of likes. Deals at Costco become internet-famous nearly every day.Right now, when you purchase a 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership online, you’ll receive a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card* after redemption. That means you can scroll, shop, and save while accessing the Kirkland Signature™ items and brand-name finds that keep showing up in your feed. Whether it’s the 680-thread-count Kirkland Signature™ Sheet Set or that air fryer everyone’s talking about, shopping viral Costco finds is more fun than watching someone else do it. What’s the deal with Gold Star? 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership for $65 $20 Digital Costco Shop Card* sent by email after redemption Free Household Card for another adult in your household Access to 500+ Costco warehouses across the U.S. Shop online at Costco.com, plan trips with Costco Travel, and explore Costco Services* To qualify for the $20 Digital Costco Shop Card, purchase and redeem your membership online by June 30, 2025, and provide a valid email address at checkout. This promotion is for new or former members whose memberships have expired for 18 months or more. Get the Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + $20 Digital Costco Shop Card for $65 now. *Services are provided to Costco members by third parties.**Insurance products are not underwritten or guaranteed by Costco. Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + $20 Digital Costco Shop CardSee Deal StackSocial prices subject to change.
excerpt: Join Costco and get a $20 Digital Shop Card* to put toward the viral finds you’ve seen all over the internet.

html:
Skip to content

Image: StackCommerce

You’ve seen the viral rotisserie chicken. The giant snack jars. The modular greenhouse with thousands of likes. Deals at Costco become internet-famous nearly every day.

Right now, when you purchase a 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership online, you’ll receive a $20 Digital Costco Shop Card* after redemption. That means you can scroll, shop, and save while accessing the Kirkland Signature™ items and brand-name finds that keep showing up in your feed.

Whether it’s the 680-thread-count Kirkland Signature™ Sheet Set or that air fryer everyone’s talking about, shopping viral Costco finds is more fun than watching someone else do it.

What’s the deal with Gold Star?

  • 1-Year Costco Gold Star Membership for $65
  • $20 Digital Costco Shop Card* sent by email after redemption
  • Free Household Card for another adult in your household
  • Access to 500+ Costco warehouses across the U.S.
  • Shop online at Costco.com, plan trips with Costco Travel, and explore Costco Services*

To qualify for the $20 Digital Costco Shop Card, purchase and redeem your membership online by June 30, 2025, and provide a valid email address at checkout. This promotion is for new or former members whose memberships have expired for 18 months or more.

Get the Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + $20 Digital Costco Shop Card for $65 now.

*Services are provided to Costco members by third parties.
**Insurance products are not underwritten or guaranteed by Costco.

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + $20 Digital Costco Shop CardSee Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
